name: Age of Conquest IV
description: Age of Conquest is a turn based grand strategy wargame. Wage colossal wars solo, against the AI, or take on your gaming friends in cross-platform multiplayer games. Form alliances and fight co-op style with the AI and other players for ultimate victory.

name: Air Brawl
store_link: Landfall Games Presskit (Available on Steam Early Access/Free at one point): https://landfall.se/air-brawl-1
description: Air Brawl provides interesting and creative ways for the player to destroy their enemies. Instead of just damage, weapons have many different attributes they can afflict on their targets. The game features 6 planes with varying roles and loadouts.

name: Albion online
store_link: Google Play (also available on Steam and other platforms): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.albiononline
description: A true cross-platform MMO experience with a vast open world, hardcore PvE and PvP combat, a fully player-driven economy, and a unique, classless "you are what you wear" system.

name: Alchemy Unbound
description: A drag and drop crafting game that offers unbound possibilities. No limits, no direction, just pure creativity and endless crafting. Uses AI to create the elements making the possibilities unbound.

name: Ampersat
description: A shooty, slashy, RPG-y game mixing retro and modern sensibilities. A blend of influences from Gauntlet & Smash TV to Zelda & Angband, Ampersat is a handcrafted adventure but with appeal to Roguelite fans. Battle ASCII creatures in colorful areas & free letters to return language to the village!

name: Astral party

name: Atlyss
description: A Singleplayer/Online RPG where you can fight with or against friends in a surreal world filled with creatures beyond comprehension. Customize and progress your character(s), complete quests, and discover strange locations.

name: AWARIA

name: Balatro

name: Besiege

name: Black desert

Become the captain of an airship and explore the world of the skies, gather resources and build powerful weapons, uncover ancient secrets and fight beneath your ship's sails.

name: Blasterbeat

name: Boardland
